Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Analyte(s): Tigecycline susceptibility (MIC) for Gram negative bacilli: Citrobacter freundii, Enterobacter cloacae, Escherichia coli, Klebsiella oxytoca, Klebsiella pneumoniae, Citrobacter koseri, Enterobacter aerogenes, Serratia marcescens
Specimen Type(s): Isolated colonies of Gram negative bacilli
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK 2 AST-GN Tigecycline antimicrobial susceptibility reagent cards for use with VITEK 2 and VITEK 2 Compact systems
Indications for Use Summary: For automated in vitro quantitative determination of Tigecycline susceptibility in Gram negative bacilli using VITEK 2 or VITEK 2 Compact Systems as a laboratory aid to determine susceptibility to antimicrobial agents.
